questions.quote: Jerry, buddy, I got to tell you something. That voice is played.
Alright I happen to know what they did last night, they had dinner with Kramer.
Yeah, Franklin Delano Romanowski.  I go to his birthday part, and just before he blew out his candles, he gives me this look..
Look I gotta be honest with you there's nothing here too spectacular.
Hey, guess what? Remember that woman you saw me with the other day? You know, she used to be an Olympic gymnast?
Well, once you were dead, we couldn't just sit on our hands. Â We had to make a move...
You know, maybe we better not. I, I think I'm getting a little cold. I don't wanna give you any of my germs.
Jerry, I was just at my stepmom's house, and I saw that you were on her speed-dial.
This is a crude mock-up of the conference room. 1/14th scale.
Now we'll open the peritoneal cavity, exposing the body's internal organs. Nurse-- retractor.
